item.description:
This event is being organized by Kelley: http://www.meetup.com...


Post-hardcore band Poison the Well have been on the scene for over a decade, and have recently put out “The Tropic Rot”, which has been well-received by fans and reviewers alike. They are one of my personal favorites, and I am especially excited to see them at Paradise on Friday—despite having already seen them perform twice this year!

They are on tour with headliners Billy Talent and AM Taxi. Since they will be the first opening band, I would advise everyone to get there early (close to doors). Tickets are $15 if purchased from Paradise directly, or $20 if purchased online.

Please take this great opportunity to experience a great band that falls into a less mainstream genre. Also, fear not, I will be bringing the earplugs. :)

Check out these webpages for more information of these bands:
http://www.myspace.co... www.myspace.com/poisonthewell
http://www.myspace.co... www.myspace.com/billytalent


To buy tickets go to: http://www.livenation...

You can also buy them from the box office at Paradise Rock Club (no ticket charges).

Paradise Rock Club
967 Commonwealth Avenue
Boston, MA 02115

Box Office hours Mon – Sat 12-6
Phone 617-562-8800
Fax 617-562-8804

Let's meet outside Paradise at 7pm. I'll send out my contact information to those who RSVP yes.

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Poison the Well and Billy Talent
